content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsechalki.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

-- use with clause to provide the data types for the columns

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

SELECT * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsechalki.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )

    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    ) AS [result]


-- general collation settings on DB lvl

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--define column names with ordinal position

SELECT * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsechalki.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )

    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE =  ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS calendar
'

SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE =  'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date DATE,
        year SMALLINT,
        month TINYINT,
        day TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT
    )
    AS calendar

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
    ) AS vendor;

    SELECT * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDQUOTE = '"'
    ) AS vendor;

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        DELIMITER = '\t'     
    )
    WITH(
        trip_type TINYINT 1,
        trip_type_description VARCHAR(100) 2

    ) AS trip_type;

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;


SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type')AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc')AS VARCHAR(20)) payment_type_description

FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS paymenmt_type

SELECT 
   *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS paymenmt_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
)

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT 
   payment_type, sub_type, value
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS paymenmt_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_description NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.payment_type_desc' AS JSON
)
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_description)
WITH(
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    value VARCHAR(20)
)

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT 
   rate_code_id, rate_code_desc
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    rate_code_id SMALLINT,
    rate_code_desc VARCHAR(20) '$.rate_code'
)

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT 
   rate_code_id, rate_code_desc
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    rate_code_id SMALLINT,
    rate_code_desc VARCHAR(20) '$.rate_code'
)

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- select data from a folder
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- wildcard characters
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--more than one wildcard character select data from specific name convention pattern - in this case monthly, yearly poartition folder
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=*/year=*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- get data from subfolders recursively

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=202*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

-- group and count the records in each file
SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
   COUNT(1)
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=202*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER by result.filename()

-- select particular files
SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,    
   COUNT(1)
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=202*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER by result.filename()

-- use filepath function

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
   COUNT(1)
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath()
ORDER by result.filename(), result.filepath()

-- extract year and month from filepath
SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
   COUNT(1)
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)

-- use filepath in where clause

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
   COUNT(1)
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = 2020 AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw''
    ) AS [result]
';

-- define columns and data types
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    
     tip_amount FLOAT,
     trip_type INT
) AS [result]

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;
-- query subfolders

SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]

-- get filename

SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,    
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]

-- query partitions with filter
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]

WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020' AND result.filepath(2) IN ('01','02','03')

-- aggregate total trips per month in 2020

SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS total_trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]

WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
GROUP BY result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY total_trips

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;


-- general query for delta table
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA' 
    )
AS [result]

-- good practice is to declare the type and format of the columns

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA' 
    )
    WITH(
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(2)
    )   
AS [result]

-- If we want to target partition we use year and month

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK'trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA' 
    )
    WITH(
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count int,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(2)
    )    
AS [result]
 WHERE year = '2020' AND month IN ('01','02')

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT    
    MIN(total_amount) AS min_total_amount,
    MAX(total_amount) AS max_total_amount,
    AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total_amount,
    COUNT(1) AS total_number_of_records,
    COUNT(total_amount) AS not_null_total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
AS [result]


SELECT    
    payment_type,
    count(1) AS num_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
AS [result]
WHERE total_amount < 0
GROUP BY payment_type
ORDER BY payment_type


SELECT    
    payment_type,
    count(1) AS num_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )
AS [result]
GROUP BY payment_type
ORDER BY payment_type

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT
    taxi_zone.borough, COUNT(1) AS number_of_trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data

    JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2
        
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR (15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS taxi_zone
    ON trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone.location_id
    GROUP BY taxi_zone.borough
    ORDER BY number_of_trips DESC

USE nyc_taxi_data_discovery;

SELECT    
    DATEDIFF(minute, lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60 AS from_hour,
    (DATEDIFF(minute, lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60) + 1 AS to_hour,
    COUNT(1) AS num_of_trips

FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS trip_data
GROUP BY DATEDIFF(minute, lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60,
(DATEDIFF(minute, lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60) + 1
ORDER BY from_hour, to_hour;
